title: That Dude in Blue
description: This week's guest is David Patterson,  host of the YouTube channel thatdudeinblue! He started his channel and grew it organically, testing cars, attending events, and throwing wrenches. Now he's building a swapped 240SX, and has a blown Mustang GT to show for it. He's a good guy, puts out cool content, and has some great reasons why wrenching is not as easy as internet commenters make it sound.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
